resources.string: A Dreamhouse With a Prime Location - This vacation getaway is centrally located in an upscale neighborhood and is only a short drive from everything. Located on a large lot, this home has many great amenities to offer such as a game room with three game tables, open-beam vaulted ceilings, a unique kitchen, a spacious back deck with a propane BBQ and wireless internet.
Định tuyến và dẫn đường thông minh
Tự động phát hiện tiếp cận và hỗ trợ tự động lộ trình
Ấn quay lại lần nữa để thoát ứng dụng
18 Phan Boi Chau | Hoan Kiem District, Ha Noi, Viet Nam
Access to the location service is required to demonstrate the \'my location\' feature, which shows your current location on the map.

This sample requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Google Maps API Demos\'.
Location permission is required for this demo.
